title: How to download the book Advanced Financial Accounting for free - Quora

response.answer_text: Sigh. People always wanting free books. The answer is, you may not be able to find what sounds like a college textbook online for free. You may try Bedding, Furniture, Electronics, Jewelry, Clothing & more or Electronics, Cars, Fashion, Collectibles, Coupons and More | eBay to see about them. My kids used those sites to get college textbooks.
